content: the skirt is knitted in a round starting from the waistband and down you will begin with knitting the waist band first then fold the work together and knit stitches together with the cast-on edge and then continue on knitting the skirt body the instructions are given for both worsted and dk weight yarns light blue skirt is from a dk yarn size shown is 2-4t striped skirt is from a worsted weight yarn size shown is 2-4t i am making this pattern available in 9 months- 12 months 16-18 inch waist 1-2 year old 17-19 inch waist 2-4 year old 20-22 inch waist 4-6 year old 22-25 inch waist happy knitting and as always feel free to ask questions
